body:
### Welcome to Yannan Hu's webpages.

I am a PhD candidate in Public Health at Erasmus Medical Center, Rotterdam, under the supervision of [Johan P. Mackenbach](https://survey.erasmusmc.nl/intern/pwp/jpmackenbach) and [Frank J. van Lenthe](https://survey.erasmusmc.nl/intern/pwp/fvanlenthe). I will defend my PhD thesis on 14th, September 2016. My research interests are public health, social epidemiology, and applied econometrics. 

For more information, please see my [Curriculum Vitae](yannan-hu.github.io/Yannan Hu_CV.pdf).

### Education

- 2012 –2016 (exp), Ph.D. in Public Health, Erasmus Medical Center (EMC), The Netherlands
- 2009 –2011, M.A. in Labor Economics, Shanghai University of Finance and Economics (SUFE), China
- 2005 –2009, B.A. in Finance, Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST), China
    
### Work experience

- 2011-2012, Accountant, Audit department, KPMG, Shanghai, China
- 2010, Survey supervisor, the project “School Type and Education of Migrant Children”, funded by China Natural Science Foundation, SUFE
- 2010, Intern, China Credit Information Service (P.R.C), Ltd., Shanghai, China
- 2010, Intern, Manager Assistant, Hua An Fund Management Co., Ltd., Shanghai, China
